body.p:
January the 30th 1864
Capital Hotel (No 36
Frankfort Ky --
Mssrs Landrum Hays & Ray
Gentlemen
in answer to your request I will State that my proposition is to raise a Regiment of Cavalry for the State defence of Kentucky

I have the honor to be your obedient Servant
W K Hall
